md:
giải nghĩa từ "sheer" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Sheer (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Very thin or transparent; almost see-through.
	+ Example: The sheer curtains allowed the sunlight to filter into the room.
	+ Related words: transparent, thin, filmy, gauzy.

* Sheer (adverb)
	+ Meaning: Completely or utterly; used to emphasize a point.
	+ Example: I was sheer exhausted after running the marathon.
	+ Related words: completely, utterly, totally, absolutely.

Note: The word "sheer" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
